title: Pixels Bluetooth won't work >5 inches from any device
content: I've had my phone a couple years, Bluetooth stopped working at one point and I did a factory reset and it worked again. Been about 2 years and my range has been < 5 inches for a couple months. Renamed and restarted. Can't find it under applications to clear cache....don't want to do another factory reset....any suggestions?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
